review: we went across so many gynecologist profiles at last we choose Dr.himabindu, fixed appointment with her when we visited the hospital for the first time we noticed that she is playing a role of general physician as well over there. After waiting 3 hrs finally nurse allowed us to meet doctor. And I was quietly disappointed with multiple reasons she is not having a friendly relation with the patient.explanation of issue, diet. We have invested our money and time and on other hand we expected atleast minimum care for the patient  which I didn't get from her.
